text: @NYGovCuomo Governor Cuomo I have seen as many of my listeners and viewers have seen multiple pictures of you without a mask on; I think you owe the people of New York State an explanation or in denial of the risks what's covid-19 you tell us to wear a mask and yet you don't wear one, why?
